page.description: Set the list of choices for a List field in a Form definition.

argument.name: fieldName
argument.description: Field name of the List field.

argument.name: listdata
argument.description: Choices for the list. Can either be JSON array with 'value' and optional 'text' property, or CRLF list with data in the form displayValue|storedValue

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: recordsUpdated
property.description: count of number of records updated

section.title: Node
Xbasic
